name: Gothic
description: Installer for Polish eXtra Klasyka 1.08k 2CD version
notes: On the first launch there is a window bar visible in menu. However after setting the resolution and restarting, it's no longer visible.

task.description: Installing Gothic (do not change the installation path!)
task.name: wineexec

files.install: N/A:Select the game's setup file from CD 1

content:
files:
- install: N/A:Select the game's setup file from CD 1
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Piranha Bytes/Gothic/System/GOTHIC.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Gothic (do not change the installation path!)
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
